ceo_buyer.justification: Flynn Gold Managing Director & CEO Neil Marston said...

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The document describes a new Exploration Licence Application (EL13/2024) submitted by Flynn Gold, implying they are seeking 100% control of the tenement.

currency.justification: The Capital Structure section lists values as 'A$', e.g., 'Share Price: A$0.025'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is an application for a new tenement from the government, not a purchase from another company; no cash consideration is mentioned.

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is a tenement application; no share-based consideration is mentioned.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction is a tenement application; no combined consideration is mentioned.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No share issuance is mentioned as part of this transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: No share price is mentioned for this transaction.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: Future exploration plans are mentioned, but no specific meterage is defined as a contractual commitment.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: Future exploration plans are mentioned, but no specific monetary value is defined as a contractual commitment.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Data compilation and reconnaissance exploration programs to identify priority targets.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: Once EL13/2024 is granted, data compilation and reconnaissance exploration programs will commence to identify priority targets.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Return (NSR) royalty is mentioned in relation to this tenement application.

coverage_area_raw.justification: New FG1 Exploration Licence Application (EL13/2024) submitted over 40km2 of highly prospective exploration tenure...

coverage_area_unit.justification: ...submitted over 40km2 of highly prospective exploration tenure...

resource_size_desc.justification: A resource size (1.77Moz Au) is mentioned, but the text explicitly attributes it to the adjacent Beaconsfield Gold Mine, which is on a separate, excluded Mining Lease.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: Flynn Gold Limited (ASX: FG1, “Flynn” or “the Company”) is pleased to advise...
